articles.author: Nathan Ridley
articles.title: Arsenal news: First summer transfer confirmed as William Saliba fears emerge - The Mirror
articles.description: Arsenal are stuttering on their Premier League title charge and an injury to William Saliba isn't helping. Meanwhile, the Gunners are preparing for what's set to be a crucial summer transfer window.
articles.content:
It's crunch time for Arsenal and nearly the biggest night of their season.
After slumping to three successive draws, most recently Friday's 3-3 thriller with rock-bottom Southampton, the Gunners mak… [+3054 chars]

articles.title: 'It's STILL possible!' Have Arsenal lost the title after draw vs. Southampton? | ESPN FC - ESPN UK
articles.description: Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens analyse Arsenal’s 3-3 draw with Southampton and discuss if Arsenal’s chances of securing the Premier League title are still i...
